nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_478
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The police got to the station five minutes after the explosion, and so did the reporters.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_479
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Even if you disagree with her, she is worth listening to.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_480
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The news reporters were given nothing but bare facts by the officials in charge of the investigation.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_481
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The room was well decorated, but the color of the curtain did not go well with the overall style.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_482
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Whenever we go back to the place where my husband was born, we always make the rounds of his relatives.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_483
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Contrary to his hope, his girlfriend's parents are not as approachable as his parents.
